short_description: heena kochhar is a clothing store based in shahpur jat, india.
long_description: conceived over two decades back, the brand heena kochhar has developed a unique style that has evolved and branched out around the world. the brand has a deep understanding of ancient designs along with traditional crafts, and it perfectly brings them together in a contemporary design aesthetic. a design graduate from nift, delhi, heena draws her inspiration from the charm of the bygone era. the brand specialises in textiles such as chanderis, handlooms, benarsi zari, mullmulls, ajrakh prints, and shibori and tie dye. heena kochhar's signature style has evolved from creating classic ready to wear garments, to intricately embellished formal ensembles oriented towards the asian diaspora. the designer specialises in bespoke gota and dori embroideries. heena believes in building patronage of craftspeople and works with rural talents, creating development in undeveloped & developing areas with artisans. handmade accessories to style with other outfits. weaving our dreams into reality. exclusive designs, beacon of indian craftsmanship andan exclusive indian clothing store online, with a collection of indian dresses online & popular bollywood outfit patterns that makes an elegant outfit for any grand occasion! fine detail.
business_tags: printed dress | clothing store online | craft & design | indian dresses | designer wear | handmade accessories | shipping & policy
generated_description: heena kochhar is a new delhi-based company specializing in handcrafted designer wear. founded over two decades ago, the brand is known for its unique style that combines ancient designs and traditional crafts with contemporary aesthetics. heena kochhar offers a range of textiles including chanderis, handlooms, benarsi zari, mullmulls, ajrakh prints, and shibori and tie dye. the company is particularly renowned for its bespoke gota and dori embroideries. heena kochhar focuses on building patronage with rural artisans, contributing to the development of underdeveloped and developing areas. the brand's signature pieces include the heena kochhar chogas, which are highly regarded for their beauty and craftsmanship.
